1099380.name: New England Detective: Breakfast in Boston OST and Artbook
1099380.description:
Did you enjoy the cool, smooth and sexy jazz soundtrack of “New England Detective – Breakfast in Boston”?

Then go ahead and purchase the epic soundtrack for this game!

Featuring music composed by legendary jazz pianist and composer Lorenzo “Hands” Vermonti, winner of the 2019 Milano Jazz Award and the 2018 Ferrero Jazz Competition.

With this grand soundtrack of brilliant jazz tracks, you’ll whisk yourself back to a world of femme fatales and dauntless detectives!

Track Listing:

01 – Boston Detective’s Club (4:30)
02 – Goin’ Places (4:10)
03 – Seducing the Bar (5:36)
04 – Streets of North End (3:53)
05 – A Luxurious Place (4:34)
06 – Lovers in Boston (3:45)
07 – Tremont Breakfast (4:55)
08 – Grazie Ferrero (2:54)

Total Album Length – (34:17)
1099380.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 简体中文
